content.raw:
The pose tag here and in the child element below are new in sdf 1.4. These elements are currently specified as holding a value, but I don't think the element can hold a value as well as child elements. We should move the value of parent to a sub-element. For example:
~~~
<!-- in sdf 1.3 -->
<joint>
  <parent>upper_link</parent>
  <child>lower_link</child>
</joint>
~~~
would change to
~~~
<!-- in sdf 1.4 -->
<joint>
  <parent>
    <link_name>upper_link</link_name>
    <pose>1 2 3 4 5 6</pose>
  </parent>
  <child>
    <link_name>lower_link</link_name>
  </child>
</joint>
~~~
